questionTitle: Workers who do not obey the safety regulations will be ________ immediately.
The prisoner ran ________ down the hill and escaped.
His grandmother ________ born in France.
A young art student acted as our ________ when we visited the National Gallery.
Would you ________ some onions for me, please Marisa?
She was ________ TV when the phone rang.
Susan ________ visits her grandmother every Wednesday.
Mary went shopping; ________ John did some gardening.
To make a good omelette, you must ________ the eggs very well.
Is there somewhere I can ________ this jumper?
The policeman who stopped him asked him if ________ been drinking.
They caught him cheating. His chances of passing are ________ destroyed now.
We don't know her very well, only by ________.
The teacher ________ them the answer to the question.
He stroked his cat's silky fur and the cat ________ contentedly.
I wrote to the company ________ them for a catalogue
We played the game ________ the rules.
The ________ listened attentively to every word the vicar said in his sermon.
Although a solemn tone was appropriate to the seriousness of the occasion, the speaker lapsed into ________ which was depressing rather than moving.
The politician refused to be drawn into answering ________ questions.
